Thanked them for being kind. Told them it’s ok to feel mad at me and let them know that now I understand, so I’ll step away. When they feel
comfortable I will be here. I am their dad, and I’m always there for them.
So with that, I assume there is no longer a need for a parenting plan. If I’m fighting so hard to see them but they don’t want to see me, it doesn’t make
any sense. I can’t force them to love me, so I’m going to stop.
I assume that will end 90% of our fights and give you what you want (and actually have already taken) I hope I did that in a healthy way. Everything
changed when you said AD doesn’t want to be with me.
Please let me know if you need anything and same as for the boys, I’ll be there for you. I understand why you all hate me now, so I’ll stop being your
burden. You are all free. No more Dad! I wish you the best.
